text.language: Eulogite pantata erga Kurie ton Kurion: u~mnite ke u~peru'ote: auton ic touc e~w~nac: a~m/n.
Bless the Lord, O you works of the Lord, Praise Him and exalt Him above all forever. Amen.

language.div: Terpujilah Tuhan, wahai karya-karya Tuhan, pujilah Dia dan agungkan Dia di atas segalanya untuk selamanya.
(Evlogi-te pan-ta-ta ergha, Kerie-ton ke-rion emni-te, ke epe-rip-sote avton, yes toos e-o-nas.)

text.language: باركي الرب ياجميع أعمال الرب سبحيه وزيديه علواً إلى الآباد .آمين. سبحيه وزيديه علواً إلى الآباد.
Praise Him, glorify Him, and exalt Him, His mercy is forever. For He is praised, glorified, and exalted above the ages, His mercy is forever.

language.div: Pujilah Dia, muliakan Dia, agungkan Dia, rahmat-Nya tuk s’lama-lamanya. Karena Ia dipuji, dimuliakan dan ditinggikan di atas zaman, belas kasihan-Nya tuk selama-lamanya.
(Sabe7oh magedoh zidooh olowan ela el abad ra7metoh. Fahwa almosabah walmomagad, walmota3aly 3ala el ad-har wa ela el abad rahmetoh)

text.language: سبحوه , مجدوه, زيدوه علواً, الى الأبد رحمته. فهو المسبح و هو الممجد, و هو المتعالي على الأدهار, و الى الأبد رحمته.

span.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; pointer-events: none;
